title: Discussions regarding N95 use between Dec 2019 and June 2020

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Discussions regarding N95 use between Dec 2019 and June 2020
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am seeking records discussing the issuance of rules, regulations, and guidance, around workplace use of N95s and/or higher grade respirators, to prevent transmission of COVID in the workplace between December 1, 2019, and June 1, 2020.

Should this be too broad a search, but only if that is too broad a search, you may narrow it only discussions that involve alignment with the CDC guidelines - I am not seeking the actual interagency communications.

I am also seeking records discussing the issuance of rules, regulations, and guidance, around workplace use of PPE of a lesser grade than N95 respirators - namely, but not limited to, surgical masks, cloth masks, face shields, and similar facial PPE used in place of the aforementioned - between December 1, 2019, and June 1, 2020.

Should this be too broad a search, but only if that is too broad a search, you may narrow it only discussions that involve alignment with the CDC guidelines - I am not seeking the actual interagency communications.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

ALEXANDER RICCIO

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: FOIA Logs
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide any documents responsive to request #13-F-0996 , received on June 20, 2013.

The subject of the initial request is copied below:

All agency records created on or after January 1, 2006 related to communications or discussions with the operators of communications systems or networks, or with equipment manufacturers and vendors, concerning development and needs related to electronic communications surveillance-enabling technology, include communications with foreign government representative or trade groups

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Rebecca Williams
